meaningMnemonic: You have <radical>nine</radical> <radical>flag</radical>s. With these nine flags you take them one by one and put them up your <kanji>butt</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Now that you have nine flags inside your <kanji>butt</kanji>, you have to get them out. But, you don't know how to. So you ask <reading>Siri</reading> (しり), "how do I get nine flags out of my butt?"
